name: Clarion Inn & Suites Virginia Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm always nervous about making reservations online, but was thrilled when we checked into this hotel. It is not oceanfront but it is across the street from the beach. It is the nicest place we have stayed in years. The staff went out of their way to address us by name, the hotel was very clean, the beds were soft and wonderful with a choice of pillows. Would stay there again.
reviews.title: Wonderful !

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel during our 2 days stop by visit after DC. We arrived at 3 pm and check in
reviews.title: Clean Hotel

reviews.text: was quick, and found the rooms as seen on the pictures. Staff was great, justin at front desk was very courteous and helpful. The pricing $ 178 was a bit over priced, but it is SUMMER. the location is great, the beach is just across the street. Free breakfast and free parking is a plus.
reviews.title: Getaway

reviews.text: Would not add points to my choice privileges because I booked through Expedia. This hotel messed up my reservation. We reserved a king sofa bed thru Expedia. Upon arrival we were sent to a room with no sofabed. Called to complain. We were switched to a second room which also did not have a sofa bed. Third room had two queens and a sofabed. That was resolved. The first day the room was not cleaned until 5 pm and that was after much complaining. We never had towels or toilet paper. The same thing happened the second day. I asked to speak to a manager and a manager never returned my call. I was told I could not receive any sort of refund because I booked through Expedia. I'm contacting Choice hotels corporate office because that's bull. I'm not satisfied so I need some sort of refund
reviews.title: Will absolutely stay here again! Fabulous staff!

reviews.text: Our family of four stayed the week of 7/15. we had a great stay. The staff was wonderful. Abraham at the front desk did a terrific job with any and all of our accomadting. The housekeeping staff was superior. We enjoyed breakfast each morning in the breakfast area. Yes it is a bit small but we quickly figured out we needed to get down a little earlier in the mornings. Once we did this we had no problems getting a seat. We spent a couple of evenings out on the pool/patio area. This was a really nice feature. Our room was plenty big enough for all of us, even with two adults and two teenagers. This was a great vacation trip with only a 3 minute walk to the beach. When we checked in our room was upgraded to an ocean view. This was totally unexpected and completely awesome. No the view wasn't a complete view of the ocean but, since we are from Ohio the partial view was 100% more ocean view than we have at home! When we visit Virginia Beach again we will certainly stay at Clarion again.
reviews.title: Pick a better place to stay.

reviews.text: This was my first experience staying in a Clarion Hotel. This facility and the guest room suites were clean and well maintained. The double-queen bed room provided ample space for our family of four; however, the bathroom was small and a bit cramped. The hotel staff was friendly and courteous. Having a hot breakfast included in the fee and a modestly appointed exercise room was a plus. Pool was relatively small but with the ocean and boardwalk literally across the street from the property, it was just fine. We would recommend this property to others and we would stay there again. It was a great bargain compared to the other options available.
reviews.title: We'd Recommend It and Would Stay Again! The Clarion Inn & Suites Virginia Beach

reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed to book this hotel since the staff noted it was Oceanfront, this hotel is not on the oceanfront, you could barely see the ocean View from the window because of the Holiday Inn Express is what is in front of it. The Holdiay Inn Express is Oceanfront and all the rooms have balconies overlooking the beach. The Clarion staff was deceiving and the service and cleaninless of this hotel was not good.
reviews.title: "Disappointed"

reviews.text: This is my second time staying in this hotel, and I really enjoyed it. Staff was friendly, breakfast was pretty good. Rooms were clean, and beds very comfortable. I would definitely go back.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed here with 5 of my girlfriends for 3 nights. The people at the front desk as well as housekeeping were friendly and helped us with any of our requests. When I first got there, the room key I was given was to a room that had not been completely made up for guests. When I told the front desk, they just gave me a brand new, spotless room, which I thought was very nice. They always gave us extra towels and cups since we were 6 people. They have a relatively small but nice pool with an attached little bar/cafe. We didn't go there so I can't comment on the quality. Great location, 1 block from the beach, 4 blocks from the Hilton, and everything else was nearby as well. Oh and really comfy beds!
reviews.title: Good stay

reviews.text: We booked a room at the last minute. This was the only available hotel. I was pleasantly surprised. The room and bathroom was clean. The room was a decent size, the bathroom was on the small size. The front desk staff was awesome! They were very friendly and accommodating, since we did not have any toiletries, they supplied us with complimentary personal items.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

reviews.text: My sister and I stayed at this property on August 13-15. We were very pleasantly surprised with the hotel itself. The room had two queen size beds and a sitting area with a table. It was clean and well laid out. We felt very comfortable and safe at the location and the service was excellent. The hot buffet buffet was very good. They serve eggs, sausage, corn bread, bagels toast, home fries and pastries. They also have a section for cereal hot and cold and a waffle maker. What more could you ask for? When we arrived Justin checked us in and he was very nice. We also got to know Duane who we quickly became friends with as he knew us as the Canadian girls. The location of the hotel is very convenient to the beach. Just walk across the street. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Great place to stay.
reviews.title: Mini vacation with my sister

reviews.text: First off they charge me for using the safe both days I was there even tho it was never used and than after I paid my bill and made it all the way home I had a $25 misc charge for a missing pillow. Really! Who steals a pillow! A married mom with two kids is not gonna still a pillow. So I figure there making really good money charging people all these extra charges and hidden fees cause they can. Also when we first checked in the water was not working so no shower and you couldn't even flush the toilet. There is not even enough parking the elevator is so slow and the rooms smell horrible. Will never stay here again or recommend it to any of our friends who visit Virginia Beach all the time!
reviews.title: Thieves!!

reviews.text: We stayed around the same time last year and had an enjoyable stay so we booked the same accommodations for this stay. I was disappointed in the cleanliness of the room. A dirty towel and used soap remained in the bathroom upon our arrival. I requested to have one of our beds changed. It was an 8+ hour pass the buck adventure ending with no clean bedding in the entire hotel and me laundering the sheets and making the bed at 1am. Some improvements include the poolside bar with very limited hours and the free breakfast.
reviews.title: 2nd Time Around

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was larger than we expected. We had a queen with a sofa/sitting area. View of the parking lot, but who cares. Room was clean, beds were very comfy, carpet looked new. Maid service was fine. I thought hotel may have been located too far down as it was on 26th, but it was a great location. Most of the action seems to be 17-26th. They have a bar that I believe is new that was a small pleasant place. the pool is on the small side but adequate. There were always a few open tables/chairs so I don't think people are spending much time at the pool anyway. I would stay again. The only comment I have is that there was plenty of space in the room, yet only two drawers to put your clothes in. Another dresser would have been nice. No complaints at all.
reviews.title: No complaints

reviews.text: This is by far the worst hotel I've seen for customer service. No check on until 4pm, then at 4the pm it takes 35 to minutes to check in. 1 person at the desk for 10 minutes then 1 more person comes down. That really did not help eith 25 people in line. The room is non-smoking, but reaks of smoke. I stayed in room 604 on August 5th. I will never stay here again!!
reviews.title: Worst customer service

reviews.text: From Jennifer in sales to front desk and a special shout out to Housekeeping who shoveled ten pounds of beach sand from my son's bathing suit everyday! Couldn't have selected a better location. True professionals in hospitality from top to bottom. Thank you, We'll be back! Can't get higher praise than that!
reviews.title: FANTASTIC! Staff is awsome!!!

reviews.text: I booked this hotel and got an AWESOME rate because I'm a Choice employee, and happened to see that an employee discount was available (which NEVER happens at a beach in the Summer). My family and I hadn't been to Va Beach in years, but we decided to come this Summer. This hotel was really, really nice and we all enjoyed it so much. We were used to staying a little further back on Pacific Blvd. so therefore, it was a treat to be able to step out of our hotel and walk either left or right to the stores. The beach is right across the street, so it was not difficult to carry my beach chair and umbrella across lots of busy streets.
reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations

reviews.text: Our hotel room was very large, and for the first time EVER, I slept on the sleeper sofa which was actually comfortable. Other that I slept on would have me sore for days. The rooms were very clean and nicely decorated. The bathroom is a little small, but it was clean and well stocked everyday. Our housekeeper, Julia, was wonderful. She has a great personality and always made sure that we had what we needed.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: The swimming pool was a decent size, and it has a bar right next to it. I was just a little disappointed that there was no hot tub, but oh well!! Breakfast was really good and they had a large variety to choose from. The breakfast area is VERY small, so we always took our food back to our room. I do wish that there was more than one elevator. Sometimes it would be about 10+ people on my floor waiting, and half would have to wait for the first half to use it. Not a big deal though. As you walk around the hotel, you will always see someone making sure the floor is clean and dry as well as making sure everything else is clean and orderly. I will more than likely be visiting this hotel again soon...especially if I can get my employee discount =)
reviews.title: Top-Shelf hotel in Virginia Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My son and I stayed here for the week of July 4th and I was pleasantly surprised! I got an ocean view room on the 5th floor and was pleased at how spacious it was and how great of a view we had. The front desk and housekeeping staffs were very pleasant and accommodating (props to Justin for his friendly and professional demeanor!). The parking is free and even on this busy beach week, I always found a parking space. The room was extremely clean, the beds were comfortable and we were supplied with down and down-alternative pillows on each bed. The continental breakfast was fabulous (eggs, sausage, biscuits, fresh fruit, etc) but the space to sit and eat is VERY limited. We ended up taking our food poolside or back to our room.
reviews.title: Best value!!!

aka: Clarion Inn And Suites Virginia Beach
description: Clarion Inn & Suites Virginia Beach. Welcome to the newest all-suite Virginia Beach hotel with spacious suites at over 400 sq feet. (NEWLY OPENED FALL 2011) All rooms feature flat screen TVs, refrigerators, microwaves, sofas, and complementary high-speed wireless and wired internet access. A seasonal outdoor pool and poolside bar and grill is great to unwind and relax. Steps to the beach this property is centrally located right in the heart of Atlantic Ave and walking distance to many of the best Virginia Beach attractions. Top it off with a complimentary hot breakfast each morning. Why stay anywhere else?
